definition: chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain

sentences.english: In addition, the effect of different olefins on alkylation reaction was also investigated.
sentences.chinese: 另外，還考察了烯烴碳鏈長度對苯烷基化反應的影響。

sentences.english: The effective length of carbon chain of alkanes was built up by using the polarizability effective index.
sentences.chinese: 利用極化效應指數，構造了鏈烷烴的有效碳鏈長度。
